title: I play Mid Lane Yes I do
body:
I play Mid Lane, yes I do
I play Mid Lane, how about you?

replies.body: What is the point of this?
You gotta say, i play blah blah yes i do, i play blah blah how about u. I honestly forgot abt this lol

> [{quoted}](name=MT Skjar,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=q6nXR6Qe,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-29T03:19:11.990+0000)
>
> You gotta say, i play blah blah yes i do, i play blah blah how about u. I honestly forgot abt this lol

So you can replace the "middle lane" with "*x*".
